column2: Automatically segment anatomical images into white matter, gray matter, and CSF based on prior probability maps.
column3: A list where ‘1’ represents ‘yes’ and ‘0’ represents ‘no’ (e.g., ‘[1]’).

column2: Full path to a directory containing binarized prior probability maps. These maps are included as part of the ‘CPAC Image Resource Files’ package from installation. It is not necessary to change this path unless you intend to use non-standard priors.
Full path to a binarized White Matter prior probability map. It is not necessary to change this path unless you intend to use non-standard priors.
Full path to a binarized Gray Matter prior probability map. It is not necessary to change this path unless you intend to use non-standard priors.
Full path to a binarized CSF prior probability map. It is not necessary to change this path unless you intend to use non-standard priors.
